title: Entren si se quieren reír un rato

replies.body:
"Pandillas plank"{{champion:41}} ,"El Maestro"{{champion:11}}  (asi a lo turro),"Haga ha"{{champion:90}} ,"Trine es sami"{{champion:412}} ,"Leavenworth" "Tana tris"{{champion:18}} ,"Karim H."{{champion:120}},"Tom enfriamiento"{{champion:223}} ,"ILa pepino"{{champion:420}},"Geumo Nariz{{champion:96}} son los peores en mi opinion :v

El unico que me gusto fue:Aura de sangre{{champion:114}}
